column5: Card Description
Fires rocket-shaped bullets that    release spiritual energy on impact. The bullets are low-speed\, but the  exploding effect makes them useful  in barrages.
Attacks with the insanity           wavelength directly ahead. Since    it's much like a so-called laser    attack\, it has high penetration     ability.
Manipulates the waves around her\,   making it such that the enemy can't tell where she is. Her specialty is hiding out of sight using wave      manipulation.
Projects an illusion on a different wavelength. The illusion attacks    differently depending on your       inputs. Since the illusion moves    like her\, it has a sort of          deceptive effect.
Fires shots over a wide range.      They're fast and easy to hit with\,  but there are inconsistencies in    its power.
Marks an area in her line of vision that expands as you hold the button.If the enemy is in that area when   you let go\, they will be momentarilyseized by a glance of madness.
Creates a field with a wavelength   that makes the enemy go crazy. The  enemy will see illusions\, and be    attacked by these hallucinations.
Sends several clone images around.  The spread-out dummies then regroup where they split off while damaging the enemy. The real Reisen is       invincible before the images all    regroup.

Fires a bullet towards the sky\,     which explodes and falls. The       warhead itself won't hit\, but the   explosion can be delayed by holding down the button. Can be used in     combination with regular bullets.
Fires a ring-shaped eye beam. The   beam expands over time\, so avoiding at a distance is difficult.
An eye wave that deals damage at    close range. Useful as a simple     attack or defense\, and easy to use  in direct combat.
The enemy sees various illusions    while Reisen dashes. The point of   reappearance can be chosen with the arrow keys before dashing.
Fires rings which become enormous   with distance. Cheap\, but           wide-range. Easy to use carelessly  as fake-outs and such.
A sniping spell card that fires     spiritual explosions in every       direction. The bullets explode      after a delay\, pinning down every   direction at once.
A spell that releases rings that    get larger as they get farther out  at high speed.
Sends strong ESP waves skyward in   this wide-range attack. This was    used originally to communicate with moon rabbits\, but that function willprobably never be used again.
Releases swirls of light at a       wavelength that forces the opponent into madness. It has extensive      range and power\, with setup time to match.

Pummels the enemy with lunacy waves from a short distance\, causing one  of the opponent's cards to          disappear. In addition\, the opponentis confused and can't use special   attacks for a little while.
Fires mentally-damaging bullets. If they hit\, two cards are destroyed   and the opponent falls into         confusion\, unable to use cards. A   great supporting move in battles.

A drug that reacts with air and     becomes gas. Since the gas is       heavier than air\, it sticks to the  ground and sucks the life out of    opponents. Reisen herself has       taken the antidote already.
Takes a dose of the Eirin Brand     enhancer. Attack and defense power  increase with each dose. Something  happens if you take too much\, but   nobody told Reisen about that.
A wave that will make the enemy     insane. She will see hallucinations of Reisen\, and will receive damage  from these hallucinations.

Unleashes waves of madness\, throwingthe enemy into utter mental chaos\,  unable to tell where Reisen is.     Reisen doesn't really contact other people\, so she seems to use this    move in real life pretty often.
